metadata.title: CVE-2020-1779 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: When dynamic templates are used (OTRSTicketForms), admin can use OTRS tagswhich are not masked properly and can reveal sensitive information. Thisissue affects: OTRS AG OTRSTicketForms 6.0.x version 6.0.40 and priorversions; 7.0.x version 7.0.29 and prior versions; 8.0.x version 8.0.3 andprior versions.

criterions.comment: otrs2 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
